rules_text:
Miracle {2}{B} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
Lifelink
When Henmo Battlemage enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then create a 0/0 white and blue Bird creature token and put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature you control with a counter on it.
